A cheaper and more breezy option involves songthaews (pickup trucks that act as local buses). First take one from Trat to

(80 baht); then catch another one the remaining 15 km to the border (20 baht).

Watch out for overpriced transport scams at the border if entering from Cambodia. Transfers costing 1,400 baht have been forced upon some unfortunate travellers. If someone prevents you from taking either a minibus or songthaew, walk away. If they persist, head away from the immediate border area, head up the hill for about 150 m to the police checkpoint and then pick up a songthaew or minibus from there.
